title: ICE when creating a reference to an (extern?) value of an extern type in a static context

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
Also on Rust Playground: https://play.rust-lang.org/?version=nightly&mode=debug&edition=2021&gist=5602ca55d70c4f28705a4740310228f4 ### Code ```Rust #![feature(extern_types)] extern { pub type ExternType; } extern "C" { pub static EXTERN: ExternType; } pub static EMPTY: () = unsafe { &EXTERN; }; fn main() {} ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.67.0-nightly (a28f3c88e 2022-11-20) binary: rustc commit-hash: a28f3c88e50a77bc2a91889241248c4543854e61 commit-date: 2022-11-20 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.67.0-nightly LLVM version: 15.0.4 ``` ### Error output ``` thread '' panicked at 'assertion failed: layout.is_sized()', compiler/rustc_const_eval/src/interpret/memory.rs:685:17 ```
Backtrace

``` 0: rust_begin_unwind at /rustc/a28f3c88e50a77bc2a91889241248c4543854e61/library/std/src/panicking.rs:575:5 1: core::panicking::panic_fmt at /rustc/a28f3c88e50a77bc2a91889241248c4543854e61/library/core/src/panicking.rs:65:14 2: core::panicking::panic at /rustc/a28f3c88e50a77bc2a91889241248c4543854e61/library/core/src/panicking.rs:114:5 3: >::run 4: rustc_const_eval::const_eval::eval_queries::eval_to_allocation_raw_provider 5: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::, core::result::Result>> 6: ::eval_to_allocation_raw 7: rustc_const_eval::const_eval::eval_queries::eval_to_allocation_raw_provider 8: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::, core::result::Result>> 9: ::eval_to_allocation_raw 10: ::eval_static_initializer 11: ::check_item 12: rustc_hir::intravisit::walk_mod::> 13: rustc_lint::late::late_lint_mod:: 14: rustc_lint::lint_mod 15: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::> 16: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 17: rustc_data_structures::sync::par_for_each_in::<&[rustc_hir::hir_id::OwnerId], ::par_for_each_module::{closure#1}::{closure#0}::{closure#0}>::{closure#0}> 18: ::time::<(), rustc_lint::late::check_crate::{closure#1}::{closure#0}> 19: ::time::<(), rustc_interface::passes::analysis::{closure#5}::{closure#1}::{closure#2}::{closure#0}> 20: as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once 21: ::time::<(), rustc_interface::passes::analysis::{closure#5}> 22: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 23: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query::>> 24: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query:: 25: ::enter::> 26: ::enter::, rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> 27: rustc_span::with_source_map::, rustc_interface::interface::run_compiler, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}::{closure#1}> 28: >::set::, rustc_driver::run_compiler::{closure#1}>::{closure#0}, core::result::Result<(), rustc_errors::ErrorGuaranteed>> ```
